item.description: markdown list numbered markdown list unordered footnote 1 $\LaTeX$ Rendering: $$f(x) = \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} a^n \cos(b^n \pi x)$$ $$ A = \begin{bmatrix} a_{11} & a_{12} & \dots & a_{1n} \\ a_{21} & a_{22} & \dots & a_{2n} \\ \vdots & \vdots & \ddots & \vdots \\ a_{n1} & a_{n2} & \dots & a_{nn} \end{bmatrix} $$ # r code x <- c(1,2,3,4) mean(x) # python code x = [i for i in range(5)] link: github
